title: Find a Public Meeting Agenda
description: A citizen wants to find the agenda for the upcoming city council meeting.

tasks.description: Identify the specific meeting the citizen is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the request is for the next city council meeting.

tasks.description: Search the city's public website or records portal for the meeting agenda.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the posted agenda for the meeting.

tasks.description: Provide a link to the agenda or summarize the key items for the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the citizen with the information they requested.
